name: Lair of the Fat Dragon Beta 99.2
name_original: Lair of the Fat Dragon Beta 99.2
description: This game is a silly RPG. This means it has a lot of stupid stuff in it. Playthrough should take at least 1 hour and 45 minutes to 100% if you know exactly what you're doing. Free, because it uses some of the default RPG Maker assets and assets from Nintendo. So I can't sell anything.
